content:
303 
 
  
EDUCATION AND FRENCH:  
AAU  
 ADEYEMI     
AGBORCOE   
AOCOE  
 BAYERO     
 BENIN       
 CALABAR    
DELSU  
 EACOE       
 EDALV       
EDOBUDU  
 EKSU      
Two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes/NCE merit in 
French and one(1) 
other Arts subject.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit 
passes to include 
English Language 
and French.  
  
French plus two (2) other Arts 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) EDALV and UDU accept ND plus four (4) ‘O’ level credit 
passes and admits NCE holders to 300 level.  
(ii) CALABAR accepts NCE General English Language in lieu 
of credit pass in ‘O’ level English Language.  
iii) BENIN requires.  
(a) two (2) or three (3)‘O’ level credit passes including 
English Language and others from Literature inEnglish,  
Religious  Studies,  Fine  Arts,  French, 
History/Government plus three (3) or two (2) NCE 
merit including French.  
(b) two (2)‘A’ level passes in relevant subjects plus the 
UTME requirements.  
(iv) UMYUK requires two (2) ‘A’ level passes in the subject of 
specialization and any other Arts subject. Also accepts 
NCE credit in French.
